trans-unit.source: Draws an image within a region defined by a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.

**Performance Note:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides less features then an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> for rendering images, however, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides performance benefits making them ideal for describing backgrounds, clip art, and for low-level drawing with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
See [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md) for more information.
An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect"></xref>.
Source of the image that is drawn.
Defines the rectangular area in which the image is drawn.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets or sets the source of the image
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> type.
XAML Values
*imageUri*
A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image file.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata Flags
The source of the image.
The default value is **null**.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the region in which the image is drawn.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata Flags
The region in which the image is drawn.
The default is Empty.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect"></xref> dependency property.
